gemini_config.system_instruction: I will ask of you to prepare a 1 page draft of a design partner agreement between a tech startup with IP and a potential client of that startup's technology that provides data and domain expertise to the problem space the startup is solving. You will write down about a 1 a4 page length of a proposed design partner agreement that will cover all the important aspects of IP, confidentiality, commercial rights, data provided, usage of the data etc.

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""I will ask of you to prepare a 1 page draft of a design partner agreement between a tech startup wit..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
